points.title: Making Data Science Accessible
points.description: The Workshops Team is here to make data science accessible to everyone! Whether you're just starting out or diving into advanced topics, our workshops are designed to help students build the skills and confidence to thrive as data scientists.

points.title: Hands-on Learning
points.description: We run workshops on a variety of topics, including Exploratory Data Analysis, Scikit-Learn, Generative AI Theory, LLMs, and AI Agents.
